citations.narrative:
** The licensee sold a grey kangaroo and an African crested porcupine and did not have a bill of sale and/or disposition
form for the transaction. All exhibitors must make and maintain records of all regulated animals that are acquired and the
disposition of such animals. To aid in the tracking of animals if necessary. The licensee must make and maintain
Acquisition and Disposition records for all regulated animals. To be corrected by: 07-12-2024

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
** The facility does not have an environmental enrichment program for non-human primates. Non-human primates are
intelligent and social animals that require mental stimulation and socialization for their health and well-being. The facility
must establish an environment enrichment program that is approved by the attending veterinarian. To be corrected by:
07-30-2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
** The facility does not have a plan for environmental enrichment for birds. Birds are intelligent animals and require mental
stimulation for their health and well-being. The facility must develop an enrichment plan for birds and have it approved by
the attending veterinarian. To be corrected by: 07-30-2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
** The licensee sold a grey kangaroo and an African crested porcupine and did not have a bill of sale and/or disposition 
form for the transaction. All exhibitors must make and maintain records of all regulated animals that are acquired and the 
disposition of such animals. To aid in the tracking of animals if necessary. The licensee must make and maintain 
Acquisition and Disposition records for all regulated animals. To be corrected by: 07-12-2024 
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
** The facility does not have an environmental enrichment program for non-human primates. Non-human primates are 
intelligent and social animals that require mental stimulation and socialization for their health and well-being. The facility 
must establish an environment enrichment program that is approved by the attending veterinarian. To be corrected by: 
07-30-2024. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
** The facility does not have a plan for environmental enrichment for birds. Birds are intelligent animals and require mental 
stimulation for their health and well-being. The facility must develop an enrichment plan for birds and have it approved by 
the attending veterinarian. To be corrected by: 07-30-2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
